sentences.en: Capital punishment is claimed to deter wrongdoing even better than lifelong confinement.
sentences.cn: 死刑之所以需要是因为它在制止犯罪方面甚至比终身监禁更有效.

sentences.en: He has been a long confinement to bed.
He has been put in solitary confinement for attacking another prisoner.
sentences.cn: 他因伤害另一囚犯而被隔离监禁.

sentences.en: He spent eleven years in solitary confinement.
sentences.cn: 他度过了11年的单独监禁.

sentences.en: He visited prisoners at their place of confinement.
sentences.cn: 他到犯人关押处访问了犯人。

sentences.en: He'd obviously kept himself fit despite his years of confinement.
sentences.cn: 显然，尽管监禁多年，他依旧保持着身体健康。
半步离不开轮椅对她的束缚

sentences.en: Hester Prynne's term of confinement was now at an end.
sentences.cn: 海丝特-白兰的监禁期满了.

sentences.en: In this confinement I began to be straitened for food.
sentences.cn: 在这种被困的情况下,我的粮食渐渐缺乏起来.

sentences.en: Last night he was being held in solitary confinement in Douglas jail.
sentences.cn: 昨晚他被单独监禁在道格拉斯的监狱里。

sentences.en: Plasmas have shown themselves to be very resourceful at avoiding lengthy confinement.
sentences.cn: 等离子体本身在避免长度约束方面表现得很灵活多样.

sentences.en: She had been held in solitary confinement for four months.
The animals are kept in close confinement.
sentences.cn: 动物给严密地关了起来.

sentences.en: They promised faithfully to bear their confinement with patience.
sentences.cn: 他们都老老实实的答应,要耐着性子忍受禁闭.

sentences.en: They were careless, slouchy, and more or less pale from confinement.
sentences.cn: 她们态度懒散, 精神不振,因为不见天日而脸色有些苍白.

sentences.en: They were held in confinement for three weeks.
sentences.cn: 他们被关押了三个星期。
